text: he imanavala'o! Tame te loko jeva na tha'i jaso jemane inkara karyo, ane potana bha'i'ona vise jyare ke te sapharamam hoya athava jehadamam hoya kahyum ke jo a amari pase hota to na mrtyu pamata ane na to te'one maravamam avata, tenum karana e hatum ke a vicarane allaha ta'ala te'oni dili tamanna banavi dem, allaha ta'ala jivita kare che ane mrtyu ape che. Ane allaha ta'ala tamara karyone jo'i rahyo che
